description.p: Returns the integer remainder of a number divided by another.

prototypes.prototype: Mod as N (Numerator as N, Denominator as N)

description.p: A numeric field or value. The denominator should be a non-zero value.
Returns the integer remainder of a number divided by another.

discussion.p: The Mod function calculates the integer remainder of a number divided by another.

example.caption: Mod() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Mod(12,5) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 2
